name: 葉奕良
objective: 先修課程：3001011 或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
schedule:
Week 1-2: Kinematics of particles
Week 3-4: Kinetics of particles: force, mass, and acceleration
Week 5-6: Kinetics of particles: work and energy
Week 7-8: Kinetics of particles: impulse and momentum
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10-11: Plane kinematics of rigid bodies
Week 12-13: Plane kinetics of rigid bodies: force, mass, and acceleration
Week 14-15: Plane kinetics of rigid bodies: work and energy
Week 16-17: Plane kinetics of rigid bodies: impulse and momentum
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
平時成績：10%
作業或隨堂考試：30%
期中考：30%
期末考：40%
materials:
Textbook: J. L. Meriam, L. G. Kraige, and J. N. Bolton, "Engineering Mechanics: Dynamics", 9th edition (SI version), John Wiley & Sons, Inc, 2020.

Reference: 陽毅平、朱銘祥、李昌駿、程登湖、李宇修，"動力學－從電影到工程力學"，國立臺灣大學出版中心，2023。
consultation: 請以 email：ylyeh@ntut.edu.tw 聯絡授課教師。實體課程因故取消時，將改以預錄方式進行課程教學，並於 i 學園課程網頁公告課程影片及相關規範。
